sentence.Network_en: People may roll their eyes and talk about overprotective, interfering grandmothers.

sentence.Network_en: In the beginning of Eclipse, he's too overprotective.

sentence.Network_en: I think people are given to get nervous and overprotective of a baby.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为人们对小孩过度紧张,保护欲太强.
